title: Samsung Galaxy S20 "CHONKY-EDITION" (Ultra)
description: It's so thick and heavy! There's a ton of tech crammed into one small device, but does it live up to the hype?   Buy the Samsung S20 Ultra On Amazon (Paid Link):  On Walmart (Paid Link):  On BHPhoto (Paid Link):  On Best Buy (Paid Link):   Thanks, dbrand for sending us the phone!
